  26. ‌#define cvt2num(o)        0        /* no conversion from strings to numbers */

  30. ‌#define tonumber(o,n) \
  31.         (ttisfloat(o) ? (*(n) = fltvalue(o), 1) : luaV_tonumber_(o,n))

  33. ‌#define tointeger(o,i) \
  34.         (ttisinteger(o) ? (*(i) = ivalue(o), 1) : luaV_tointeger_(o,i))

  36. ‌#define intop(op,v1,v2) l_castU2S(l_castS2U(v1) op l_castS2U(v2))

  38. ‌#define luaV_rawequalobj(t1,t2)                luaV_equalobj(NULL,t1,t2)
